title: Black Rose Cassiopeia (skin concept)
body:
So I made this sketches and concepts for a Cassiopeia skin, I believe it is really cool, considering Cassiopeia is a high status person in noxus and also considering that the black rose has been reaching and growing  influence with the high people in noxus. I think the theme is quite good and fits Cassiopeia.

Her particles.. Q being a red rose that quickly turns black  and explodes in black petals. Her W would be a dark red smoky area that releases black petals. Her E could be turned red and leave some black petals as it travels, and her R would be a black light that turns enemies to stone with black roses plants  entangling the enemies. So what do you guys think about this concept?

replies.body: You could have her E be rose thorns if the other stuff is going to look so different as well.  All in all, sounds like an awesome idea with good art.
man, I'm so jealous, gotta take inspiration from this anf work on my art. great art work from your boyfriend btw

> [{quoted}](name=SolarPWNage,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4rkZWUc,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-03-12T05:35:45.559+0000)
>
> man, I'm so jealous, gotta take inspiration from this anf work on my art. great art work from your boyfriend btw

Thank you! he practices a lot, practice makes the master!
It's cool ! I like the idea of poisonous thorns of the roses. However, I fear that it would be easy to confuse her for {{champion:143}} in game. Their Q would be pretty similar. But good. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Anthroz,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4rkZWUc,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-03-11T17:25:07.140+0000)
>
> It's cool ! I like the idea of poisonous thorns of the roses. However, I fear that it would be easy to confuse her for {{champion:143}} in game. Their Q would be pretty similar. But good. :)

I disagree with this, Zyra's Q are green thorns coming up the floor, not a red rose turning black and then exploding.

I like this a lot! Could be like Morgana's Blackthorn in terms of particle effects, would be lovely. I might try to do some art for this too. 

Actually, does your boyfriend mind if I try to color this? Especially the 2nd picture, I really like it a lot :) Will post when I'm done of course.

> [{quoted}](name=Kilobytten,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=z4rkZWUc,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-03-11T08:43:56.343+0000)
>
> I like this a lot! Could be like Morgana's Blackthorn in terms of particle effects, would be lovely. I might try to do some art for this too. 
> 
> Actually, does your boyfriend mind if I try to color this? Especially the 2nd picture, I really like it a lot :) Will post when I'm done of course.

I think you could do that ONLY if you say you are just coloring and you are not the original artist and put a link to this post. I think that would be fair.

Forgot to ask, when crediting the artist, what name should I put down? I will have text going across the image that says "sketch by: .... Colors by: Kilobytten" etc. :)

I did a [similar piece here](http://artofkilosophy.tumblr.com/post/110324584373).
Yup. :) So long as you and your bf are cool with it.
wow, that's really freaking great. Your bf got skill
Your boyfriend's art is gorgeous! Nice idea, and maybe one for LeBlanc too because she's part of the black rose or whatever in the lore...
Really cool concept and design. I'd love to see a skin like this for Cassiopeia. I think it captures her really well, being both dark and elegant.

I need this

Especially since they butchered Mythic for no reason
These are beautiful, I definitely like this idea
